pr_title: Fix invalid flag setting for RegExp

timeline.message: Fix invalid flag setting for RegExp

timeline.bodyText:
I think the change is ok but I wonder why that failed the test. We're supposed to rewrite the old all transparently.
@markharwood can you check that the leniency is applied correctly ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: There is a change that was not in the current form: apache/lucene-solr#1659
